name: The Daily Life of a Mermaid
name_original: The Daily Life of a Mermaid
description:
You play as a mermaid (1st person view) trying to keep her home, the ocean, clean. Collect as much trash as fast as possible, before there is too much! 

This game is best played in Full Screen mode.

This is inspired by The Little Trashmaid comic by sOs3, as well as organizations such as The Ocean Cleanup.

Enjoy playing my submission for the Unity CWC Game Jam of May 2022.
